features: 360 degree full coverage protection Design : Real 360 degree protection and protects your doorbell ,it doesn't block the video doorbell sensor.There is a hidden security screw at the bottom and it is not easty to be stolen

Compatible Doorbells:compatible with Video Doorbell / Video Doorbell 2 / 3 / 3 Plus / 4 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release), Please check the left picture No.2 for Compatible model No. (Doorbell is Not Included )

2 Ways Installation: There is Strong grade VHB tape at the back of cover , just tear it off and stick it on the door (Note: After the adhesive tape, wait for at least 24 hours before using.) or install it on the wall with included screws

Ideal for Smooth door Surface: The mount is safest and most effective for applying on a flat, smooth door surface like laminates Tile Glass Marble , Please install it with the included screws on the brick, shingles, and rough wall surfaces.
Warranty: Your satisfactions is our first goal, If you have any questions with the order, Please feel free to contact us firstly and then we will give the quick solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this box. It’s easy to install and take out to charge. It sticks on brick and doors as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous about this holding up in rain, snow, etc, but it’s held up great and never fallen. We have it attached directly onto brick, installation was very clear and simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very strong adhesive, has not fallen off at all. Easy set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish the screw wasn’t so far back, it’s hard to turn to get it on and off when my hand is right against the wall. It also would be nice if the screw was on top so it didn’t fall when you went to unscrew it to charge it. Realistically I could just switch it, but still…. It holds very well, we’ve had quite a few bad storms here lately and it’s held on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Apartments to avoid damage & theft
reviews.reviewText: I live in an apartment and cannot not drill/screw this device into the sliding as it is not my property. Also I was concerned about theft or damage to my device from neighbors. The adhesive is strong and sticks to the from metal door, no drilling, damage or screws. The security cage ensures my device cannot be easily damage, hit, or broken from neighbors or a burglar. It does have a security tiny screw with a special tool to secure device & makes it easy to remove and charge the battery. Yes anyone with this tiny security tool can unscrew and remove the doorbell camara but not quickly without being seen or alerted and allowing me time to contact the police. Definitely worth the cost if you live in a rental property to avoid damage to building but want to fell safe, secure with your door bell monitor. Being a single mum of two kids, I do not like to open my door if the knock is unexpected or late at night. Or this allows me to monitor the in/out of my rental property from maintenance or the property owner. I deserve privacy, security, and monitored access

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t wait 24hrs to stick it on there soon as I put it on it stayed in placed and it’s very sturdy I bought two of these for both of my doors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great, the little screws holding it together on the bottom are little, pay attention so you don't lose them! Works great though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate the adhesive part of this product being very strong. I applied pressure to it and even tried to pull it off, but it didn't budge. I placed my ring camera in it after six hours, and it's still holding up strongly. Although the screw part is set back, I managed to make it work without any problem. Moreover, I love the fact that people can't unscrew it easily because the screwdriver is uniquely designed. The black parts on the sides are too thick to fit, but that doesn't bother me since it doesn't affect the camera's field of view. Initially, when you push the doorbell, it pushes back, but I found a solution by cutting the back strip in half and placing it horizontally at the bottom of the box. This fixed the issue, and now there's no more pushback. I'm really satisfied with it, and I'll definitely order another one if I need a ring for my back door. Just ordered my 2nd one now I have one at my front and back door I’ll put one at every door if I had more doors😍
